parameters.name: bind_secret_id
parameters.description: Require secret_id to be presented when logging in using this AppRole.

parameters.name: secret_id_bound_cidrs
parameters.description: Comma-separated string or list of CIDR blocks;

parameters.name: token_bound_cidrs
parameters.description: Comma-separated string or list of CIDR blocks;

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of policies set on tokens issued via this AppRole.

parameters.name: secret_id_num_uses
parameters.description: Number of times any particular SecretID can be used to fetch a token from this AppRole, after which the SecretID will expire.

parameters.name: secret_id_ttl
parameters.description: Duration in either an integer number of seconds (3600) or an integer time unit (60m) after which any SecretID expires.

parameters.name: token_num_uses
parameters.description: Number of times issued tokens can be used.

parameters.name: token_ttl
parameters.description: Duration in either an integer number of seconds (3600) or an integer time unit (60m) to set as the TTL for issued tokens and at renewal time.

parameters.name: token_max_ttl
parameters.description: Duration in either an integer number of seconds (3600) or an integer time unit (60m) after which the issued token can no longer be renewed.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Duration in either an integer number of seconds (3600) or an integer time unit (60m).

parameters.name: enable_local_secret_ids
parameters.description: If set, the secret IDs generated using this role will be cluster local.
